# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="11cc8-102">웹용 Outlook에서 언어, 날짜 및 시간 형식 또는 표준 시간대 변경</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="11cc8-103">페이지 맨 위에서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="11cc8-104">**설정** > **모든 Outlook 설정을 봅니다**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="11cc8-105">**일반** > **언어 및 시간**을 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="11cc8-106">사용할 언어를 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="11cc8-107">**저장**을 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="11cc8-108">자세한 내용은 [웹용 Outlook에서 표준 시간대 및 언어 설정 변경을](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273)참조 하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="11cc8-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
